title: Spankrock logo
content:
hi all.

i think this might be a custom, but does this font ring a bell to anyone (i know, the sample is ridiculously small, couldn’t find bigger...)? [http://luxux.com/spank.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810000011/http:/luxux.com/spank.jpg "http://luxux.com/spank.jpg")

thanks.

 [‹ (x) Hand-drawn book type - FreeDom {Mike Y (self)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810000011/http:/typophile.com/node/19306 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Lushes" sugarsweet script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810000011/http:/typophile.com/node/19355 "Go to next forum topic")
author: milliondollarfingers

comments.content: mm yeah.. sure futura extra bold is close, but those nuances are what i was looking for.. thanks anyways.

We’ve had quite a few requests for stencil faces in the past, and I can’t remember ever encountering this one during those searches. Maybe this logo was custom designed for the artist. Sorry I can’t be more helpful.

If anybody ever come across it we’ll definitely let you know.
